title: Android Engineer

jobDescription:
• Writing Clean, Readable, Testable, and Reusable Code.
  • Design simple systems that are built for scale.
  • Break down complex problems into small and simple problems.
  • Consider Software Development as a craft and keep improving every day.
  • Working closely with other Developers, UX designers, Business and System Analysts.
  • Take part in all daily activities like Stand-ups, Iteration planning, Retrospectives.
  • Write Unit Tests and Integration Tests to ensure correctness.
  • Ensure the apps are performant - no memory leaks, no frame drops, battery usage, etc
  • Explore and evaluate new technologies, tools and SDKs as may be necessary to improve the entire development pipeline.
  • Successful track record in development of native android apps.
  • Two or more apps published in Google Play Store.
  • Expert level skills in Android Programming, Rich UI Development, Debugging Skills.
  • Experience in Connecting devices wirelessly using Bluetooth and WIFI protocol.
  • Excellent command over Data Structures and Algorithms
  • Excellent problem solving, critical thinking and communication skills
  • Debugging skills, including identifying bugs, memory leaks, performance bottlenecks
  • Experience with offline storage, multi-threading, and performance tuning
  • Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications
  • Knack for benchmarking and optimization
  • Extensive experience using Version Control systems like Git/Bitbucket and planning
  • Experience in IoT Wearable, NoSQL DBs, Android Graphics, Jetpack Compose

  • Knowledge of low-level C-based libraries is preferred
  • ARCore will be added value
  • Freedom to implement and follow industry best practices.
  • Get to work with the most down to earth and talented people.
  • Get to work on very interesting problems with impact in the real world.
  • We are always working on a bleeding-edge tech stack. MicroServicesServerlesswe got you covered.
  • Open and Inclusive Environment.
  • Remote first teams.
  • Flexible timings as long as work gets done.
  • Opportunity to contribute to open-source projects.

title: React Native_Mobile Appllication
jobDescription:
We are seeking a strong Mobile app developer with 5 to 8 years of experience who can develop mobile apps using React Native.
Â 
Technical expertise over all aspects of Mobile apps Hybrid, React Native, Android and iOS, but also has a good experience in dealing with App Store and Play Store.
You should have experience in installing third-party plugins like camera, async storage, filesystem, map, and integrating with REST API services using fetch, XMLHttpRequest, Graphql and axios library.
You should also have worked on JavaScript middleware technology like Redux, Redux-thunk, or Redux-saga.
Your experience should extend to JavaScript ES5/ES6, React Native flex box and flex properties, Integration of Native modules , building responsive UI, and SQL / RealmDB database applications.
Experience with various mobile SDK integration ( Firebase, Analytics, Facebook etc.,)
Experience with payment gateway integration ( Stripe, Justpay, Apple Wallet etc.,)
Your understanding of asynchronous programming and Knowledge on Typescript is added advantage.
You should have a proven track record of using code versioning tools, such as Git.
Strong understanding of mobile UI design principles and best practices
Has worked on app performance improvement and React native version upgrades.
Experience with continuous integration and deployment using tools such as Azure devops or App centre
Having an understanding and experience on mobile app security will be considered a plus.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

title: IOS/Android
jobDescription:
Diverse Lynx is looking for IOS/Android to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey.As a Mobile App Developer specializing in both iOS and Android platforms, you will be a key player in the design and development of innovative mobile applications. Collaborating with cross-functional teams, you will contribute to the creation of high-quality, user-friendly experiences across multiple platforms.

Responsibilities : Cross-Platform Development : Design and develop mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms.Utilize cross-platform frameworks such as React Native or Flutter to streamline development.Platform-Specific Expertise : Develop native components for iOS using Swift or Objective-C.Develop native components for Android using Java or Kotlin.Leverage platform-specific capabilities for optimized app performance.

Code Quality and Standards : Write clean, modular, and maintainable code.Conduct code reviews and contribute to the improvement of coding standards.Identify and address performance bottlenecks.Cross-functional Collaboration : Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other developers to deliver high-quality software.Communicate effectively with team members and stakeholders.Problem Solving : Identify and resolve issues, bugs, and bottlenecks in a timely manner.Work on continuous improvement of application performance and user experience.Technical Documentation : Create and maintain technical documentation for developed applications.

title: Java, Android Professional
jobDescription:
• T-web exponent services pvt ltd is looking for Java, Android Professional to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • Mobile Application Development:Develop and maintain native Android applications using Java and the Android SDK
  • Implement user interfaces and user interactions based on design specifications and UX/UI best practices
  • Ensure compatibility with a wide range of Android devices, screen sizes, and resolutions
  • Backend Integration:Integrate mobile applications with backend services and APIs using RESTful interfaces
  • Implement data synchronization, offline data storage, and caching mechanisms to enhance app performance and responsiveness
  • Performance Optimization:Optimize application performance, memory usage, and battery consumption to deliver a smooth and efficient user experience
  • Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks through profiling, code optimization, and architectural improvements
  • UI/UX Design Implementation:Translate design wireframes and prototypes into fully functional Android applications with pixel-perfect accuracy
  • Implement animations, transitions, and custom UI components to enhance the visual appeal and usability of the app
  • Testing and Debugging:Write unit tests, integration tests, and UI tests to ensure the reliability and stability of Android applications
  • Debug issues reported by QA or end-users, and provide timely resolutions to maintain app quality and user satisfaction
  • Code Maintenance and Refactoring:Refactor and optimize existing codebase to improve code quality, maintainability, and scalability
  • Ensure adherence to coding standards, best practices, and architectural guidelines throughout the development lifecycle
  • Platform Compatibility:Stay updated on the latest Android platform updates, SDK releases, and development tools, and ensure compatibility with the latest Android versions
  • Adapt applications to support new Android features, APIs, and design guidelines introduced by Google
  • Cross-Functional Collaboration:Collaborate with product managers, designers, and backend developers to define requirements, prioritize features, and deliver high-quality solutions
  • Participate in Agile development processes, including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and sprint reviews
  • Documentation and Knowledge Sharing:Document technical specifications, architectural decisions, and code changes for reference and knowledge sharing
  • Contribute to internal knowledge repositories, developer documentation, and best practices guides
